title.narrative: F.a: Preventing Violent Extremism among Youth in Uganda

description.narrative: The Eastern districts of Uganda and the urban centre of Kampala are cited as key areas in the growth of extremism. The strategies of radicalization and violent extremism remain a choice that terror groups use to recruit membership. All indicators point to a worsening situation in Uganda if the dual threat of youth discontentment and the spread of radical ideologies fail to be addressed. It is from this background that it has become imperative for actors like Finn Church Aid and its local partner UYMDF to c arry out a comprehensive assessment of key drivers of radicalization and violent extremism in the country as well as map out the actors and areas of intervention that can help reduce the growing radical trends. Based on the assessment, a comprehensive stra tegy will be designed to address the problem.Expected results:? Key drivers of violent extremism and radicalisation identified and analysed? A thorough analysis and evaluation of the impact, severity and priority of radicalization and violent extremism?
